metadata.title: CVE-2024-26582 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: tls: fix use-after-free with partial reads and async decrypttls_decrypt_sg doesn't take a reference on the pages from clear_skb,so the put_page() in tls_decrypt_done releases them, and we triggera use-after-free in process_rx_list when we try to read from thepartially-read skb.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
